snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored his 10th goal of the season, and the Washington Capitals used a four-goal first period to beat the visiting Colorado Avalanche, 7-3, on Saturday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals beat Colorado Avalanche, 7-3, with four-goal first period; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored his 10th goal of the season, and the Washington Capitals used a four-goal first period to beat the visiting Colorado Avalanche, 7-3, on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Capitals’ Four-Goal Spurt Helps Topple the Avalanche
headline.main: Capitals’ Four-Goal Spurt Helps Topple the Avalanche
